name: abomasite
effect: Held: Allows Abomasnow to Mega Evolve into Mega Abomasnow.
short_effect: Held: Allows Abomasnow to Mega Evolve into Mega Abomasnow.

flavor_text.sword_shield: One of a variety of mysterious Mega Stones. Have Abomasnow hold it, and this stone will enable it to Mega Evolve during battle.
